main event: Three witnesses reported seeing two bright objects in the sky for about 5 minutes on July 9, 1957, in Shiloh, Ohio.
interesting points: The objects were described as circular in shape and reddish-orange in color,Approximately 50 feet in diameter,The objects made a sharp 90-degree turn and then accelerated out of sight,Another sighting involved a different object that appeared to be 30 feet in diameter and hovered for about 2-3 minutes, No noise was reported from the sightings.
sighted object: two bright circular objects in the sky
witness description: three individuals, two residents of Shiloh and one visitor
